author: Dylan Shield (Shieldia.co)
name: SIGMA - PHP Stream Med Sec
query:
from logs-apache.access-default metadata _id, _index, _version | where url.query rlike ".*data://.*" or url.query rlike ".*file://.*" or url.query rlike ".*ftp://.*" or url.query rlike ".*php://*" or url.query rlike ".*zlib://.*" or url.query rlike ".*glob://.*" or url.query rlike ".*phar://.*" or url.query rlike ".*ssh2://.*" or url.query rlike ".*rar://.*" or url.query rlike ".*ogg://.*" or url.query rlike ".*expect://.*"
| eval timebucket=date_trunc(5minutes, @timestamp) | stats value_count=count_distinct(url.query) by timebucket, source.ip, host.name
| where value_count >= 1
